comment.author: 48147418@N04
comment._content: Summertime, circa 1974 San Diego,  I walked into PSA office for summer work. The lady at the desk said, " We have opening for Pilot, you can apply right now!!! " I smiled back, " Madam, I am just a Freshman at local College looking for summertime work. "  Remember the Cocktail Flight from San Diego to Los Angles, Up and Down we go!!!! Happy Memories of flying PSA.
